hero.name: Fermayil
hero.description: Front-End Developer focused on performance, design, and clean code.
about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a detail-oriented and self-driven Front-End Developer passionate about building scalable and user-friendly web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern UI libraries. I focus on writing clean code, transforming designs into functional interfaces, and integrating APIs. I enjoy teamwork and continuously strive to improve my skills and deliver impactful digital experiences.
skills.title: Skills
contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Whether it’s a new project, collaboration opportunity, or a technical question — feel free to reach out. I aim to respond as promptly as possible.
